item.description:
What a great opportunity to share with our fellow citizens on Veterans day by handing out free copies of the US Constitution. We'll have a Ron Paul promo piece tucked inside each one. We've got hundreds to handout. Come, enjoy the parade and do an easy and fun activity to support Ron Paul. The parade starts at 10:30. Let's meet at 10:15 at Holman Stadium to muster-up.

----

Here's the description of Sunday's venue I got from a local website:

NASHUA
Parade through city downtown Sunday

Nashua?s Veterans Day parade Sunday will form between 9:30 and 10:30 a.m. in the parking lot at Holman Stadium. Step-off is at 10:30 a.m.
The parade route will follow Amherst Street to Main Street to Lake Street and disband at Elm Street Junior High School. Brief memorial services will be held between 8 and 9:30 a.m. at local cemeteries and monuments.
item.name: Nashua Veterans Day Parade Constitution Handout
